mapper.select: select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') NOT IN ('X') Group by jcustomer_code ORDER BY jcustomer_code
select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) Group by jcustomer_code ORDER BY jcustomer_code

select jkey, jpum , jgugek , jsize, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, convert(integer, DBO.DF_TB_PCODE_JQTY(jkey, #{frdate}, #{todate}) ) as jqty from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') Like concat('%',#{jcustomer_code},'%') and isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') ORDER BY jcustomer_code, jmodel_code, jpum

select jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jbonsa_code, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, Convert(int, jchgoga0) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE3.jmodel_code = E.jcifcode) WHERE isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') and isnull(delflag,'0') = '0' ORDER BY jkey

select jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jbonsa_code, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, Convert(int, jchgoga0) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE3.jmodel_code = E.jcifcode) WHERE isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') and isnull(delflag,'0') = '0' and isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and isnull(jmodel_code,'') Like concat('%',#{jmodel_code},'%') ORDER BY jpum
mapper.insert: insert into JCODE3 ( jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jbonsa_code, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, jchgoga0, jbigo, delflag) values (#{jkey}, #{jpb_gubn}, #{jgong_code}, #{jdan_code}, #{jmodel_code}, #{jcolor_code}, #{jcustomer_code}, #{jbonsa_code}, #{jsayong_gubn}, #{jpum}, #{jgugek}, #{jsize}, #{jchgoga0}, #{jbigo}, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE JCODE3 SET delflag = '1' where jkey = #{jkey}
mapper.select: SELECT jbonsa_code, jmodel_code, jpb_gubn from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') = #{jpb_gubn} AND jsayong_gubn IN ( '1', '2','3') GROUP BY jbonsa_code, jmodel_code, jpb_gubn ORDER BY jbonsa_code, jmodel_code, jpb_gubn
